DOC.brief_summary: This study aim conduct 3-year perspective study observe immunological effect one-dose mumps-containing vaccine , monitor incidence mumps vaccinate population age 2-7 yearsï¼Œand provide basis adjust MMR immunization strategy Jiangsu province , China .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Assess Protection Mumps Children Received One-dose Mumps-containing Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: 2-7 year old child high risk mumps , epidemiological investigation serum IgG antibody level conduct , prospective observational cohort establish population history mumps vaccination , incidence mumps antibody level group observe , relationship different antibody level incidence mumps vaccinate analyzed , explore attenuation mumps IgG antibody level body , S79 vaccine strain F genotype mumps ' antigenic cross-reactivity protective effect antibody .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Children age 27 year old ; 2. local resident child live least 3 month ; 3. physical health , vaccinate least dose MuV 1. administer MuV ; 2. refuse collect venous blood ; 3. infected mumps ; 4. serious illness reason participate study clinical evaluation
